article.headline: UCLA 71, Richmond 63
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- Lazeric Jones scored 16 points and Travis Wear added 14 as UCLA defeated Richmond 71-63 on Friday night. Jerime Anderson had 13 points, David Wear 12 and Joshua Smith 11 for the Bruins (7-5), who have won five straight games. Anderson and David Wear had seven rebounds each as UCLA took advantage of the smaller Spiders (7-6). The Bruins enjoyed a 42-30 rebounding advantage and outscored Richmond 38-10 in the paint. Darien Brothers led the Spiders with 25 points, and Derrick Williams added 14. The score was tied 24-all at halftime, and UCLA scored the first seven points of the second half to take permanent control.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
